aspectran.description: This is an example using the Freemarker template engine.

translet.name: free
translet.description: | | It uses the Freemarker template engine to output the values of the input parameters to the console. |

aspectran.template: |-------------------------------------------------------- |SELECT | id, | name, | email |FROM users |<@directive.where> | <#if id?has_content> | id = :id | </#if> | <#if name?has_content> | AND name = :name | </#if> | <#if email?has_content> | AND email LIKE :email||'%' | </#if> |</@directive.where> |ORDER BY name |-------------------------------------------------------- | The values to be set in the PreparedStatement instance. | id = ${id?default("")} | name = ${name?default("")} | email = ${email?default("")} |--------------------------------------------------------

|-------------------------------------------------------- |UPDATE users |<@directive.set> | name = :name, | email = :email, |</@directive.set> |<@directive.where> | id = :id |</@directive.where> |-------------------------------------------------------- | The values to be set in the PreparedStatement instance. | id = ${id?default("")} | name = ${name?default("")} | email = ${email?default("")} |--------------------------------------------------------
